H0.text: Gerascophobia is the persistent fear of doing what. Losing physical strength

H1.text: Gerascophobia is the persistent fear of doing what. Forgetting important memories

H2.text: Gerascophobia is the persistent fear of doing what. Being dependent on others

H3.text: Gerascophobia is the persistent fear of doing what. Growing old/ageing

A4.text: Gerascophobia is an abnormal or incessant fear of growing older or ageing (senescence).

A5.text: Symptoms include efforts to stop the natural processes of ageing and development by altering their physical appearance through either surgeries or excessive routines to promote anti-aging.
